casebody.data:
CARTER-HUBBARD
v.
WRMC HOSPITAL. No. 411A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 31, 2006. John M. Logsdon, North Wilkesboro, for WRMC. Mark W. Merritt, Blake W. Thomas, Charlotte, for CMHA. Linwood Jones, Raleigh, for NC Hospital Asso.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of October 2006 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Carter-Hubbard Publishing) shall have up to and including the 4th day of December 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 31st day of October 2006."
